name: If Tag Then Post WordPress
author: jackreichert

sections.description: Ideal for pairing with the WordPress mobile app, this plugin lets you set set trigger conditional actions on posts based on post_tags added to the post. For this initial version, you can change the post type. More functionality and actions planned.
sections.installation:
1. Upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set up actions under the menu Settings > IFTTP Settings
sections.faq:
Why would I want to use this, can’t I do it from the app already?

The WordPress app does not support custom post types, I created this so that you can set posts to the desired post type from the app.

What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.

short_description: Like the popular tool IFTTT, this plugin allows you to trigger conditional actions on posts based on tags.
description: Ideal for pairing with the WordPress mobile app, this plugin lets you set set trigger conditional actions on posts based on post_tags added to the post. For this initial version, you can change the post type. More functionality and actions planned.
